is_activated.description: Whether the chest is activated and ready to be opened

player_id.description: The ID of the player who owns the chest

instant_level_up_common_to_rare.description: Instant level up from common to rare

instant_level_up_rare_to_epic.description: Instant level up from rare to epic

instant_level_up_epic_to_legendary.description: Instant level up from epic to legendary

score_threshold.description: The score threshold for this chest

rewards.description: The rewards configuration for this chest

slots_remaining.description: Slots remaining for cursor (used with filling soon filter pagination)

minStartDate.description: Minimum start date - filters tournaments with start_date >= minStartDate

maxEndDate.description: Maximum end date - filters tournaments with end_date <= maxEndDate

search.description: Search term to filter tournaments by name or description

isFillingSoon.description: Filter tournaments by filling soon status

start.description: Start rank for this distribution range

end.description: End rank for this distribution range

payout.description: Payout percentage for this rank range

tournament_id.description: Tournament ID associated with this reward

creatorName.description: Name of the player who created the tournament

numberOfCards.description: Number of cards required for each deck

slotsRemaining.description: Slots remaining until filled (only when using filling soon filter)

bonusAmount.description: Bonus amount from company subsidy (only for public lobbies)

totalPrizePool.description: Total prize pool including bonus (prizePool + bonusAmount)

fragments.description: Total fragments spent on inscriptions for the day

totalFragments.description: Fragments spent on deck registrations per timeframe

uniquePlayers.description: Unique players who registered decks per timeframe

dailyDeckDataChart.description: Daily inscriptions and fragments spent for charting

startOnceFilled.description: Whether the tournament should start once it is filled

numberOfCards.description: Number of cards required for each deck

bannedHeroesIds.description: Hero IDs that are banned from deck creation

code.description: Invite code for the private tournament

deckCount.description: Number of decks in the tournament

totalEntries.description: Total number of entries for this player

rewards.description: How much this deck will receive from the total prize pool

search.description: Search term to filter heroes by name or handle

score.description: Hero fantasy score in the lobby

message.example: The tournament description contains inappropriate content.

id.description: Unique identifier for the outcome state

total_shares.description: Total shares in circulation for this outcome

total_invested.description: Total fragments invested in this outcome

total_volume.description: Total volume traded for this outcome

market_id.description: The market ID this outcome belongs to

outcome_state.description: Current state of the outcome (shares and investment)

odds.description: Odds multiplier for $1 investment in this outcome

isFromChildMarket.description: Whether this outcome is from a child market

childMarketTitle.description: Title of the child market this outcome belongs to
childMarketTitle.example: Will Hero X finish in top 5?

entities.description: Entities directly linked to this outcome

marketEntity.description: Entity linked to the parent market

k.description: Constant K value for the LMSR market

preset_id.description: ID of the preset configuration used for this market

is_seeded.description: Whether initial liquidity has been seeded

resolver_id.description: ID of the player who resolved the market

outcomes.description: List of outcomes for this market

items.description: Quoted odds for all provided bets/legs

totalInvestedAfterFee.description: Total amount invested in fragments (after fees)
